ucmd lspSourceCursor main_template main.py 0
setenv offset stdout

ucmd lspReferences main.py offset
contains stdout "main.py:1:5"
contains stdout "main.py:5:14"
contains stdout "main.py:6:14"

-- main_template --
def ma●in1(a):
	return main2(a+1)
def main2(a):
	return a+1
print("%f" % main1(1))
print("%f" % main1(1)+main2(2))
